languages.text: "Но кажется, он и сам смущен размахом репрессий госпожи Инцендии, а это открывает возможности. Если надавить на него, он приведет к нам фанатиков, готовых растерзать того, на кого он укажет. Полезный человек, я сожалею, что не наладил наше с ним взаимопонимание раньше".

"But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not getting him onside sooner."
languages.original_text: "Но кажется, он и сам смущен размахом репрессий госпожи Инцендии, а это открывает возможности. Если надавить на него, он приведет к нам фанатиков, готовых растерзать того, на кого он укажет. Полезный человек, я сожалею, что не наладил наше с ним взаимопонимание раньше".

traits.locale_text: "But he himself seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not establishing rapport with him sooner."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "But he himself seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not establishing rapport with him sooner."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not establishing rapport with him sooner."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not establishing rapport with him sooner."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not getting him onside sooner."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not getting him onside sooner."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “不过，因森蒂娅女士大清洗的规模，似乎让他很吃惊，这也为我们带来了新的机会。如果我们对他来硬的，他就会召集一大批狂热分子，他指着谁，那群人就会把谁撕成碎片。他是个很有用的人，我很后悔没能早点把他拉拢到我们这边。”
languages.original_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not getting him onside sooner."

traits.locale_text: “不过，因森蒂娅女士大清洗的规模，似乎让他很吃惊，这也为我们带来了新的机会。如果我们对他来硬的，他就会召集一大批狂热分子，他指着谁，那群人就会把谁撕成碎片。他是个很有用的人，我很后悔没能早点和他搞好关系。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「しかし、奴はレディ・インセンディアの粛清の規模に驚いているようだ。それは新たな可能性を意味する。プレッシャーを与えれば、あいつの命令さえあれば誰であっても引き裂くような狂信者たちを連れて来るだろう。これは使える。もう少し早く、あいつを味方につけておくべきだった」
languages.original_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not getting him onside sooner."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、奴はレディ・インセンディアの粛清の規模に驚いているようだ。それは新たな可能性を意味する。プレッシャーを与えれば、あいつの命令さえあれば誰であっても引き裂くような狂信者たちを連れて来るだろう。これは使える。もう少し早く、あいつを味方につけておくべきだった」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Pero parece sorprendido por la magnitud de las purgas de Incendia, lo que abre posibilidades. Si le presionamos, traerá fanáticos que destrozarán a quien señale con el dedo. Un hombre útil. Lamento no haberme aliado con él antes».
languages.original_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not getting him onside sooner."

traits.locale_text: «Pero parece sorprendido por la magnitud de las purgas de Incendia, lo que abre posibilidades. Si le presionamos, traerá fanáticos que destrozarán a quien señale con el dedo. Un hombre útil. Lamento no haber establecido una relación con él antes».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Er scheint jedoch verstört vom Ausmaß der Säuberungen unter Lady Incendia zu sein, und das eröffnet Möglichkeiten. Wenn wir ihn unter Druck setzen, schickt er Fanatiker, die jeden zerreißen, auf die er mit dem Finger zeigt. Ein nützlicher Mann. Ich bedauere es, ihn nicht schon früher auf unsere Seite geholt zu haben."
languages.original_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not getting him onside sooner."

traits.locale_text: "Er scheint jedoch verstört vom Ausmaß der Säuberungen unter Lady Incendia zu sein, und das eröffnet Möglichkeiten. Wenn wir ihn unter Druck setzen, schickt er Fanatiker, die jeden zerreißen, auf die er mit dem Finger zeigt. Ein nützlicher Mann. Ich bedauere es, nicht schon früher eine Beziehung zu ihm aufgebaut zu haben."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Cependant, il semble avoir été choqué par l'ampleur des purges de dame Incendia, ce qui nous ouvre des possibilités. Si nous lui mettons la pression, il amènera des fanatiques prêts à massacrer tous ceux qu'il leur désignera. C'est un homme utile, je regrette de ne pas l'avoir gagné à notre cause plus tôt. »
languages.original_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not getting him onside sooner."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, il semble avoir été choqué par l'ampleur des purges de dame Incendia, ce qui nous ouvre des possibilités. Si nous lui mettons la pression, il amènera des fanatiques prêts à massacrer tous ceux qu'il leur désignera. C'est un homme utile, je regrette de ne pas être entré en contact avec lui plus tôt. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Fakat Leydi İncendia'nın tavsiyeleri belli sınırları aşmış olacak ki fikri değişmiş. Bu da bazı seçeneklerin önünü açıyor tabii. Üstüne gidersek peşine taktığı bağnazlarına dilediğimizi öldürtebiliriz. İşlevli bir adam. Keşke saflarıma daha evvel katabilseydim."
languages.original_text: "But he seems taken aback by the scale of Lady Incendia's purges, which opens up possibilities. If we put pressure on him, he'll bring over zealots who'll tear apart whoever he points his finger at. A useful man. I regret not getting him onside sooner."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat Leydi İncendia'nın tasviyeleri belli sınırları aşmış olacak ki fikri değişmiş. Bu da bazı seçeneklerin önünü açıyor tabii. Üstüne gidersek peşine taktığı bağnazlarına dilediğimizi öldürtebiliriz. İşlevli bir adam. Keşke saflarıma daha evvel katabilseydim."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
